title: DAX Fridays #201: How to create virtual tables using DAX
excerpt: In this video I will show you how you create virtual tables in DAX to do calculations on them.   Happy Friday!  The  sample file is available for download here: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
